item.title: Build an AM312 Presence Detector Using ESP32 and Home Assistant
item.description: Build an AM312 Presence Detector Using ESP32 and Home Assistant Ever walked into a room and wished the lights would just know to turn on? That’s the magic of presence detection—no clapping, no waving, just pure automation. In this guide, I’ll show you how to build a DIY presence detector using an AM312 PIR sensor and ESP32, then integrate it with Home Assistant for seamless smart home control. I’ve tinkered with a dozen motion sensors, but the AM312 is a standout for its low power consumption and compact size.
